Outstanding wish I had the money.

Yeah, the line across the forehead is a small scratch on the case so

Only blemish I can see is the back bottom corner, which is barely
Noticeable to the naked eye, high res pic makes it a lot worse I’d say.

Anyway, thanks for checking it out.
